contents.name: MaxBatchSize
contents.description: The maximum number of values to send as batch in one message to the EdgeAgent.

contents.name: FlushInterval
contents.description: The interval in which the values should be flushed from the buffer and send to the Data-API. Regardless if the MaxBatchSize was reached.

contents.name: Streams
contents.description: Contains all Simualted streams the given source.
